com.ng.apersist.dao

Class DAO<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ng.apersist.dao.DAO<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - PersistenceClass
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestDaoThree, TestDaoTwo

    public abstract class DAO<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Supertype for DAOs. Supplies the insertion, update, delete and selection of PersistenceObjects.
    Author:
    Niels Gundermann

        public T insertOrUpdate(T object)
        If ID of param exists in Table, this method will update the entry with the ID. Otherwise it will create a new entry. Attention! Use only single id columns.
